mapper.select: SELECT v.video_number,v.user_id,v.category_code,v.video_title,v.public_check,v.video_reports,v.video_insert_date,v.video_rank_limit, vf.orgin_video_name,vf.stored_video_name,vf.orgin_video_thumb,vf.stored_video_thumb, (SELECT count(vr.reply_number) FROM video_reply vr WHERE vr.video_number = v.video_number) AS 'reply_count' FROM video v JOIN video_file vf ON v.video_number = vf.video_number WHERE v.category_code = #{cateCode} ORDER BY v.video_number DESC LIMIT #{pageStart},#{perPageNum}

SELECT v.video_number,v.user_id,v.category_code,v.video_title,v.public_check,v.video_reports,v.video_insert_date,v.video_rank_limit, vf.orgin_video_name,vf.stored_video_name,vf.orgin_video_thumb,vf.stored_video_thumb, (SELECT count(vr.reply_number) FROM video_reply vr WHERE vr.video_number = v.video_number) AS 'reply_count' FROM video v JOIN video_file vf ON v.video_number = vf.video_number WHERE v.category_code = #{cateCode} ORDER BY reply_count DESC,v.video_number DESC LIMIT #{pageStart},#{perPageNum}
mapper.update: update video set video_reports = video_reports + 1 where video_number = #{video_number}
mapper.select: select reply_number,video_number,reply_content,reply_register,reply_insert_date,reply_orgin_number,reply_order,reply_depth from video_reply where video_number = #{video_number} order by reply_number desc
